text: Ana hige'na ana nanekea antahintahinifi atrogeno me'nege'na refko hute'na, kva vahe'tamine erizante'ma ugotama hu'naza vahetaminena amanage hu'na zamasami'noe, tamagra magoke vahe mani'nazanki na'agafare nofi'ma hu'naza zagorera amema'a ante marerita enerize. Anage hute'na ana vahera zamuvufintanke huku, ana maka vahe kuhuge'za eme eri tru hu'naze.
